    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/madhya-pradesh-tour-packages" title="Madhya Pradesh Tour Packages">Madhya Pradesh</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2e88cf88f3_90673102" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/include/charming-madhya-pradesh_mmmda0.jpg" alt="Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour" title="Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Your wildlife tours will take you from Keoladeo National Park, a World Heritage Site, to the Bandhavgarh National Park for the ‘Royal Tiger Show’ to the Kaziranga National Park to savour the ‘Single-Horned Rhinoceros’ that are on the verge of extinction. There is more to your expeditions even as you enter the lone home for ‘Asiatic Lions’ in Gir National Park or enjoy the big cats and birdlife of the Kabini and Periyar way down south, with the exploration of the dense forests and wild beasts of more than 100 jungles in India through the ‘Adventure and Wildlife’ tour packages. You may have to sleep in eco tents or luxurious wildlife resorts or budget hotels but these sanctuaries will give you a pass into the parallel universe of the wildlife thriving in the Indian Territory in their own majesty and splendor. All the major online tour operators offer tour packages to enjoy the beastly species existing in our country, giving you the option to make your choice of tour location and other requirements.</p>
<p><strong>About The Package:</strong></p>
<p>Namaste Indi Trip is one of the reasonably-rated tour operators quite popular among tourists in India for its service quality and meeting the needs of the customers. This online company has designed ‘adventure and wildlife’ tour packages according to customer requisitions, catering to the smallest detail that these packages require. You will be taken to all the major wildlife sanctuaries of the country right from the eastern region to the western and southern regions of the country. Get a view of the exquisite flora and fauna variety in these important conservation areas and feel the presence of the innumerable species that survive in the different geographical locations of the Indian Territory. Namaste India Trip offers the customization facility for customers with tight financial budgets and their total enjoyment is thoroughly ensured by the professional expertise offered by the company.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival at Jabalpur and Moving on to Bandhavgarh:</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>The Namaste India Trip representative will receive you at Jabalpur airport and drive you to the Bandhavgarh National Park. As you reach the resort in Bandhavgarh you will check-in and take rest. You may speak to any naturalist in the evening and learn more about this National Park. Spend the night at the resort.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>At Bandhavgarh National Park</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Start the day with breakfast and then get into the jungle for a wildlife extravaganza. Treat yourself with the variety of flora and fauna of this region. You can also opt for tiger tracking if you are in for adventure. Return to your resort for dinner and night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Bandhavgarh National Park Continued</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On day 3 after a heart breakfast continue with the safari of the national park. You can also choose elephant ride for a different and adventurous treat of the jungle. You may even succeed in tracking the tigers today. Get back to the resort for spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Bandhavgarh to Kanha National park (250km)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On this day opt for a morning safari if the jungle to enjoy the ambiance at this time. Post breakfast check out of the Bandhavgarh National Park to reach Kanha National Park. Check into the resort at Kanha and spend the night here.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>At Kanha National Park</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Day 5 starts with an early breakfast after which arrangements will be made for you to make an entourage of the Kanha National Park. Try looking for the ‘Royal Bengal Tiger’ as you discover the amazing vegetation and wildlife of this area. You can also opt for bird watching to while away your time as you wait for tigers to appear. In the evening return to the resort for dinner and night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Kanha National Park Continued</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On day 6, finish up with breakfast after which you can resume your jungle safari of the Kanha National Park. You can also try and spot the ‘Royal Bengal Tiger’ that rules in this land. Apart from this majestic creature there are other birds and animals local to this region that can be spotted during your safari. Get back to the resort for dinner and rest.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Kanha to Pench National Park (200km)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After breakfast on day 7 you will leave Kanha for Pench which is 200km away from here. Upon arrival in Pench you will be checked into the resort. Once you have freshened up and taken rest stroll along the park in the evening time to take in the fresh air and soothing ambiance of the forest. Dinner will be served at the resort after which you can rest for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>At Pench National Park</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>As day 8 starts you will complete your breakfast and then enter the Pench National Park to get some more of the natural vegetation and wild beasts residing in this region. Explore various parts of the park to learn more of the habitat and the geography of this region. Lunch will be arranged for and you can return to the resort for spending the night at Pench.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Pench to Nagpur</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Day 9 will begin with breakfast after which you can take another walk along the wildlife park. Later on after you are done with your lunch you will drive back to Nagpur. Spend the night at Nagpur hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 10 :</span>Tour Ends</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On the final day you will leave Nagpur post a hearty breakfast. The Namaste India Trip representative will escort you safely to the departure point at the airport to move on for home.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour Package Home » India » Madhya Pradesh » Madhya Pradesh Wildlife Tour Tour Overview Your wildlife tours will take you from Keoladeo National Park, a World Heritage Site, to the Bandhavgarh National Park for the ‘Royal Tiger Show’ to the Kaziranga National Park to savour the ‘Single-Horned Rhinoceros’ that are on...
